data.text: Flair Airlines F8501 from YVR to Kitchener-Waterloo exited the runway at the end of its landing. There were no reported injuries. Passengers deplaned the aircraft and were taken to the terminal by bus. The safety and well-being of our passengers and crew is our top priority.

Happy #InternationalDayoftheAirTrafficController! Whether on the runway or in the tower, big thanks to all Air Traffic Controllers for always keeping an eye on the sky and getting us where we need to go!

data.text:
Would you be able to spot a victim of #HumanTrafficking? Thanks to the help of our partners at @NIMCAlly, Flair employees are trained to recognize potential behavioural signs and get help without putting the concerned individual in harm's way.

#EndHumanTrafficking #NotInMyCity

Today is World Day against Trafficking in Persons. Flair is proud to partner with @NIMCAlly, an organization that aims to raise awareness and take collective action to prevent and end human trafficking and sexual exploitation.

#EndHumanTrafficking #NotInMyCity ✈️🌼 https://t.co/cYRAM2QPkA

POV: Your bags are packed. Your OOO email reply is set up. You've backed up your phone to make room in storage for new vacay pics. And you've just turned on airplane mode.

data.text: Starting to think that our #ShotFromTheDot is too easy... because we have our THIRD winner, Stefane Deeks! 🥳 Stefane scored the first #ShotFromTheDot at tonight's @GNighthawks home game, winning him a trip to the @cebleague Championship Weekend in Ottawa! https://t.co/ykqkevuLyS
